data.name: EditTemplates.Text
data.value: Edit Templates

data.name: plTemplate.Text
data.value: Template

data.name: plTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a template to edit.

data.name: AlbumInfo.Text
data.value: Individual Album Template

data.name: PhotoInfo.Text
data.value: Individual Photo Template

data.name: plTemplateBody.Text
data.value: Template Body

data.name: plTemplateBody.Help
data.value: Edit the body of the template.

data.name: cmdRestoreDefault.Text
data.value: Restore Default Template

data.name: SetDefault.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Want To Restore The Template Default?

data.name: AllAlbums.Text
data.value: All Albums

data.name: ALBUM.Text
data.value: A random image representing the album, this is *without* borders.

data.name: ALBUMCOUNT.Text
data.value: Number of sub-albums belonging to this album, displays nothing if none exist.

data.name: ALBUMLINK.Text
data.value: The URL to view photos belongong to that album.

data.name: ALBUMWITHBORDER.Text
data.value: A random image representing the album, this is *with* configurable borders.

data.name: EDIT.Text
data.value: A link to edit the album/photo, only visible to authorized users.

data.name: PHOTOCOUNT.Text
data.value: Number of photos belonging to this album, displays nothing if none exist.

data.name: RSS.Text
data.value: A link including the RSS image to a RSS file for this album.

data.name: RSSLINK.Text
data.value: The URL to view the RSS file for this album.

data.name: TITLE.Text
data.value: The title of the album/photo.

data.name: AUTHORID.Text
data.value: The author of the photo's ID.

data.name: AUTHORDISPLAYNAME.Text
data.value: The author of the photo's display name.

data.name: AUTHORFIRSTNAME.Text
data.value: The author of the photo's first name.

data.name: AUTHORLASTNAME.Text
data.value: The author of the photo's last name.

data.name: AUTHORUSERNAME.Text
data.value: The author of the photo's username.

data.name: APPROVERID.Text
data.value: The approver of the photo's ID.

data.name: APPROVERFIRSTNAME.Text
data.value: The approver of the photo's first name.

data.name: APPROVERLASTNAME.Text
data.value: The approver of the photo's last name.

data.name: APPROVERUSERNAME.Text
data.value: The approver of the photo's username.

data.name: DATEAPPROVED.Text
data.value: The date approved of the photo.

data.name: DATECREATED.Text
data.value: The date created of the photo.

data.name: DATEUPDATED.Text
data.value: The date last updated of the photo.

data.name: DESCRIPTION.Text
data.value: The description of the album/photo.

data.name: FILENAME.Text
data.value: The filename of the photo.

data.name: HEIGHT.Text
data.value: The height of the photo.

data.name: HOMEDIRECTORY.Text
data.value: The home directory of the album containing the photo.

data.name: PHOTO.Text
data.value: The photo without the configurable border.

data.name: PHOTOLINK.Text
data.value: The URL to view the photo in a slideshow.

data.name: PHOTOWITHBORDER.Text
data.value: The photo including the configurable border.

data.name: PHOTOWITHBORDERNOLINK.Text
data.value: The photo including the configurable border and no link.

data.name: WIDTH.Text
data.value: The width of the photo.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the Edit Templates Module

The Templates Module allows you to customize the layout of the module.

data.name: ControlTitle_edittemplates.Text
data.value: Edit Templates

data.name: ALBUM-DATECREATED.Text
data.value: The date created of the album. Use [DATECREATED:XXX] where XXX is a date expression for custom formatting.

data.name: ALBUMID.Text
data.value: The ID of the album belonging to the photo.

data.name: ALBUMNAME.Text
data.value: The name of the album belonging to the photo.

data.name: PHOTOWITHOUTBORDER.Text
data.value: The photo without the border.

data.name: DOWNLOADLINK.Text
data.value: A link to download the photo.

data.name: ZIP.Text
data.value: A link including the save image to a ZIP file for this album.

data.name: ZIPLINK.Text
data.value: The URL to view the ZIP file for this album.

data.value: Add to Cart Template

data.name: ITEMID.Text
data.value: The photo ID.

data.name: ITEMNAME.Text
data.value: The photo name.

data.name: ViewCart.Text
data.value: View Cart Template

data.name: THUMBNAILLINK.Text
data.value: The URL to the thumbnail of the photo.

data.value: Edit Template

data.value: Tokens

data.value: [ISINROLE:XXX]Some Text[/ISINROLE:XXX] where XXX is the role name.

data.value: [ISNOTINROLE:XXX]Some Text[/ISNOTINROLE:XXX] where XXX is not in the role name.

data.value: Is the album not selected? [ISNOTSELECTED]Text[/ISNOTSELECTED]
